name: Crush Plasmol
description:
Play the cutest match-3 game and enjoy over 100 amazingly crafted level of fun!

Crush Plasmol is our new match 3 puzzle game. Immerse yourself in this animated candy world. All levels have specific objectives that need to be achieved. Create combos, explosions, or use one of your three available skills to create magic effects over the alive candy! This game is a real brain teaser. Match three candy and see the result. Match four of five candy and create special candy that will blast the line. Use your magics and create even more fun!

Crush Plasmol Pop Match 3 Game is a sweet cute match-3 puzzle game, fun for everyone!

HOW TO PLAY Crush Plasmol
• Match 3 or more candies of the same color!
• Complete the objective
• Match 4 or 5 candy and create special effects candy
• Beat your score and try to get 3 stars on each level
• Get better score with one of the three special skills!

FEATURES OF Crush Plasmol
• Classic match three puzzle
• Beautiful graphics and animations
• 100 well crafted levels
• Relaxing and cool fun music
• Easy to play, colorful and cute animated characters
• SAFE FOR KIDS, NO IN-APP-PURCHASE
• NO TIME LIMIT
• NO WIFI NEEDED!
